experienceDescription: I have been working with software development and cloud technologies for over {{years}} years.
skillsDescription1: I've developed enterprise-level projects and 100% automated systems. I've created innovative solutions to overcome complex challenges.
skillsDescription2: I have {{nodeYears}} years of Node.js experience and {{linuxYears}} years of Linux experience. I also have basic knowledge of Python, C++, Java, and Rust, although I don't use them as frequently.
projectsDescription1: This year I've made {{commits}} commits and I use git effectively in my projects.
projectsDescription2: I've developed game engines, databases, management panels, VDS management systems, AI integrations, and more.
continuousDevelopmentDescription: I'm always curious and continuously learning. In my projects, I use systems like Microsoft Azure, AWS, Firebase, and I create my own API keys.
